text: My daughter came for a trial class and we really enjoyed the overall experience. The teacher was very professional and nurturing. The booking process was smooth. My daughter is a newbie to art lessons but she was guided very well by the teacher who stayed by her side. A nice place for kids to relax and enjoy art.
I had a great bonding session with my 3 year old, itâ€™s a nice and cozy space and allows her to express what she wants freely. We love it!

Teacher Thoiy is a very nice teacher. Painting is all about feelings and being in peace. You can find it relaxing and concentrating while painting or drawing if you are a little familiar on how to do art work you will understand that you can enjoy.
Thank you Teacher Thoiy for teaching me how to paint. She have a good personality.ðŸ˜Š

Frst time coming here with my children to try and it was a very good experience. I can see that my children enjoyed painting. The teachers are kind and patient, they guide the children and let them do their own art at their own pacing as well. I recommend this art studio a lot to those who want to try.
The art studio has a nice environment. My daughter really enjoyed the art class. The teacher was patient and guided her through the details. Great place for art jamming activities too!
